channel.title: BlizzardRSPS - The return of Xanor [STABLE][JAM-PACKED][COMMUNITY-BASED][ECO][;D
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]BlizzardRSPS[/b][/size] [i]The return of Xanor![/i] [b]An community-built server, for you and all! Feel free to pop in[/b] [url=http://blizzardrsps.com]PLAY NOW![/url] [b]Introduction[/b]
[b]BlizzardRSPS[/b] was a server based 2012, full of crazy-ass features which never worked. But this 2013 return, has surely made me realize that there is more to a RuneScape Private Server, than it's features. You're more than unlikely to find unique features on 317 servers anymore, unless It's a new type of mini-game or event. But anyhow, we've implemented many old features and new into a server, to create a whole new atmosphere, which I never knew existed. The server source is based on a source which is currently for sale, and although It's purchased, I'm hoping to make community-progress with it, and through hopefully a new communities help, I'll be fixing any possible bugs, and implementing-community chosen features, because I feel the community's wants and taste is what is important. I just hope you enjoy this exotic server, which may hopefully one day evolve into revolution and a new home to many RSPS veterans. I, as the owner of this server, hope I can help you through your stay and guide you through your journey, I respect all my players.
[b]Features + Progress[/b]
634 Animations & Gfx 525 maps and objects 634 items - Clipped player following, attacks, NPC's and projectiles - All client hovers working - Stable source - 634 Gfx and animations - Many re written classes - 8+ bosses to battle - Minigames re wrote - Flawless combat system - Packed with content - Repackaged server and client - Working enchanted items such as ring of life, recoil and phoneix necklace etc - 9 different user ranks with crowns + new commands system - Tweaked Combat - Changed Mapmarker - Changed Original Skull PK icon & interface icon - Bug free fullscreen/resizeable - webclient compatible - Transforming Rock crabs/NPCs and high detail maps - Quick prayers/curses saved on logout - XP counter (Saves, formatted etc) - Changed Client Icon - Added new Head ranks system above players! - Fixed RS2loginProtocol, with it fixed a dupe also got fixed: a lot of mandatory login flags were not taken into consideration. For example, and you can test this yourself, try and log into an account that is already logged in. The server won't reject the procedure like it should. I've taken the time to restructure the class - Added new Interface for Head-Ranks handling, choosing ranks to show - Added 7 new head ranks (Gfx,Vet,EXtreme don,Dev,Mod,Headmod,Owner - Added new Stat reset interface - Added stat resetter in Achievemnt tab, under Config - Added working buttons to stat resetter - Added 100% Switching, switching should work flawless - Re-Wrote Tormented Demons - Re-Wrote Corporeal Beast - Re-wrote Jad Minigame... Now working 100% - Added new Donator zone - 100% clan chat - Also includes lootshare/coinshare with loot potential & saving - Added Donator panel - Added NPC transforming to the donator panel - Re-wrote whole barrows class 100% working - Re-wrote whole Pest control class, working 100% - Fixed stackables & noted items for free - Flawless 525 maps with 32k+ object interaction - All skills working and advance - Custom login screen - Choose between animated or the non animated client backgrounds - Animated login screen with changer - Fully working Rs cursor system added - Patched alot of dupes - Added RSA - Added player shadows - Added smileys (emoticons) - Fixed alot of T2s - New icons for spell book teleports - Cleaned up Proccess void () - Cleaned up some messy code - Enhanced Client performance, but still using too much MEM - Enchanced stability of the Server - Fixed bug minimap icons such as trees etc, was loaded 2 times, wich caused a conflict, making none of them show - Fixed Pink floors/maps at Duel arena - Added new texture for water, darkish, HD feeling - Added a info tab instead of a quest tab - Added " Name, level, rank, all points, kills, deaths" in info tab - Added "Players in wildy" into the info tab - Added a config tab with Reset stats & headicons - Quest system added - Fully working hitmarks and criticals - Working nex armour effects - Added more detailed textures/floors - Replaced "Report abuse" button with "Screenshot" Saves in cache/Screenshots - Fixed black tiles bug, in edge etc - Updated Head Ranks, added Removing the ranks - Started GrandExchange - Added when withdrawing, offering, can write Eg. 10M or 5k instead of 10.000.000, 5.000 - Patched five dupes in GrandExchange - Full GrandExchange - Various Skilling Zones - Fixed most dupes and issues [b]10/01/2014[/b] - Daily events - Friendly staff and always open for new staff. [b]More and more[/b] :D
[b]Screenshots[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/8e2796d585b1ec2289168cc3c5f4f646.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/f3f893da5a5e66ab914ddd0eb34aa4ff.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/5b3a02909935497d689898e5cffe8408.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/ffde47127e0d2a71aba4a1da457aa8ea.png[/img] [b]If you would like your ingame screenshot added to the collection, please contact Jay ingame![/b] [b]Credits[/b]
Oxyshade Tringan TheLife RawEnvy Savior/Speciality PX's Developement team & NickName for some client features.
[b][COLOR=GREEN]Other Information[/COLOR][/b]
As of the moment, I'm not accepting donations, as I'd like to see for a little while how the server develops, as I do not want to be taking money on a server If I am unsure of It's future, I'm hoping to continue the server, and if all goes well I'll pay monthly for this, with the community's help. The server fees are little, and we're running on a nice DDOS Protected VPS. Although donations are accepted, I tend to give away a few donor spots on odd occasions, so look out for that.
[b]Looking for[/b]
Scouting for: [b]12/01/14[/b] Logo, Reward: In game Donator Rank (PM me for details or contact in game)
[i]Thank you for all reading, I hope to see some of you shortly ingame, let the adventure begin![/i] [b]Please do not post negative comments, I'd appreciate the feedback, but I'm also not up for arguments on this advertisement thread, please respect this. Thank you all, and hope to speak to some of you shortly. :) [/b] [/center]

item.title: BlizzardRSPS - The return of Xanor [STABLE][JAM-PACKED][COMMUNITY-BASED][ECO][;D
item.dc:creator: @3owl 3owl
item.description:
@3owl wrote:

[center][size=24pt]BlizzardRSPS[/size]
The return of Xanor!
An community-built server, for you and all! Feel free to pop in

PLAY NOW!

Introduction

[b]BlizzardRSPS[/b] was a server based 2012, full of crazy-ass features which never worked. But this 2013 return, has surely made me realize that there is more to a RuneScape Private Server, than it's features. You're more than unlikely to find unique features on 317 servers anymore, unless It's a new type of mini-game or event. But anyhow, we've implemented many old features and new into a server, to create a whole new atmosphere, which I never knew existed. The server source is based on a source which is currently for sale, and although It's purchased, I'm hoping to make community-progress with it, and through hopefully a new communities help, I'll be fixing any possible bugs, and implementing-community chosen features, because I feel the community's wants and taste is what is important. I just hope you enjoy this exotic server, which may hopefully one day evolve into revolution and a new home to many RSPS veterans. I, as the owner of this server, hope I can help you through your stay and guide you through your journey, I respect all my players.

Features + Progress

634 Animations & Gfx 525 maps and objects 634 items

  • Clipped player following, attacks, NPC’s and projectiles

  • All client hovers working

  • Stable source

  • 634 Gfx and animations

  • Many re written classes

  • 8+ bosses to battle

  • Minigames re wrote

  • Flawless combat system

  • Packed with content

  • Repackaged server and client

  • Working enchanted items such as ring of life, recoil and phoneix necklace etc

  • 9 different user ranks with crowns + new commands system

  • Tweaked Combat

  • Changed Mapmarker

  • Changed Original Skull PK icon & interface icon

  • Bug free fullscreen/resizeable - webclient compatible

  • Transforming Rock crabs/NPCs and high detail maps

  • Quick prayers/curses saved on logout

  • XP counter (Saves, formatted etc)

  • Changed Client Icon

  • Added new Head ranks system above players!

  • Fixed RS2loginProtocol, with it fixed a dupe also got fixed: a lot of mandatory login flags were not taken into consideration.
    For example, and you can test this yourself, try and log into an account that is already logged in.
    The server won’t reject the procedure like it should.

I’ve taken the time to restructure the class

  • Added new Interface for Head-Ranks handling, choosing ranks to show

  • Added 7 new head ranks (Gfx,Vet,EXtreme don,Dev,Mod,Headmod,Owner

  • Added new Stat reset interface

  • Added stat resetter in Achievemnt tab, under Config

  • Added working buttons to stat resetter

  • Added 100% Switching, switching should work flawless

  • Re-Wrote Tormented Demons

  • Re-Wrote Corporeal Beast

  • Re-wrote Jad Minigame… Now working 100%

  • Added new Donator zone

  • 100% clan chat - Also includes lootshare/coinshare with loot potential & saving

  • Added Donator panel

  • Added NPC transforming to the donator panel

  • Re-wrote whole barrows class 100% working

  • Re-wrote whole Pest control class, working 100%

  • Fixed stackables & noted items for free

  • Flawless 525 maps with 32k+ object interaction

  • All skills working and advance

  • Custom login screen - Choose between animated or the non animated client backgrounds

  • Animated login screen with changer

  • Fully working Rs cursor system added

  • Patched alot of dupes

  • Added RSA

  • Added player shadows

  • Added smileys (emoticons)

  • Fixed alot of T2s

  • New icons for spell book teleports

  • Cleaned up Proccess void ()

  • Cleaned up some messy code

  • Enhanced Client performance, but still using too much MEM

  • Enchanced stability of the Server

  • Fixed bug minimap icons such as trees etc, was loaded 2 times, wich caused a conflict, making none of them show

  • Fixed Pink floors/maps at Duel arena

  • Added new texture for water, darkish, HD feeling

  • Added a info tab instead of a quest tab

  • Added " Name, level, rank, all points, kills, deaths" in info tab

  • Added “Players in wildy” into the info tab

  • Added a config tab with Reset stats & headicons

  • Quest system added

  • Fully working hitmarks and criticals

  • Working nex armour effects

  • Added more detailed textures/floors

  • Replaced “Report abuse” button with “Screenshot” Saves in cache/Screenshots

  • Fixed black tiles bug, in edge etc

  • Updated Head Ranks, added Removing the ranks

  • Started GrandExchange

  • Added when withdrawing, offering, can write Eg. 10M or 5k instead of 10.000.000, 5.000

  • Patched five dupes in GrandExchange

  • Full GrandExchange

  • Various Skilling Zones

  • Fixed most dupes and issues 10/01/2014

  • Daily events

  • Friendly staff and always open for new staff.

More and more

Screenshots




If you would like your ingame screenshot added to the collection, please contact Jay ingame!

Credits

Oxyshade Tringan TheLife RawEnvy Savior/Speciality PX's Developement team & NickName for some client features.

[COLOR=GREEN]Other Information[/COLOR]

As of the moment, I'm not accepting donations, as I'd like to see for a little while how the server develops, as I do not want to be taking money on a server If I am unsure of It's future, I'm hoping to continue the server, and if all goes well I'll pay monthly for this, with the community's help. The server fees are little, and we're running on a nice DDOS Protected VPS. Although donations are accepted, I tend to give away a few donor spots on odd occasions, so look out for that.

Looking for

Scouting for: [b]12/01/14[/b] Logo, Reward: In game Donator Rank (PM me for details or contact in game)

Thank you for all reading, I hope to see some of you shortly ingame, let the adventure begin!

Please do not post negative comments, I’d appreciate the feedback, but I’m also not up for arguments on this advertisement thread, please respect this. Thank you all, and hope to speak to some of you shortly.
[/center]

Read full topic
